content: …by cutting food from children, care for elderly, clean air for everyone, pussygrabber can continue to fly aroundd in Air Force One at our expense playing golf on his three day weekends ($10,000,o000. per weekend), sending his kids and their $ecret $ervice detail$ ($1.500,000 per trip to oversee his manufacturing companies in other countries), melanoma’s $ecret $ervice detail to the tune of $147,000 PER DAY, EVERY PHEUCHING DAY…..
